alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland; Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 5:07PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A line of strong showers will impact portions of Bay, Saginaw and Midland Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 505 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers along a line extending from Edenville to near Breckenridge to DeWitt. Movement was northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Edenville around 510 PM EDT. Merrill around 515 PM EDT. Bentley around 520 PM EDT. Midland and Freeland around 525 PM EDT. Auburn, Oakley and Marion Springs around 530 PM EDT. Chesaning around 535 PM EDT. St. Charles and Linwood around 540 PM EDT. Pinconning around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Carrollton, Garfield, Arthur, Fenmore, Crump, Buena Vista Township, Gera, Indiantown, Bombay and Hemlock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
